20101222001002.000|20101222001004.000|TR0|Times" when Governor Barbour was running 
20101222001004.000|20101222001006.000|TR0|for Senate back in those days.  It reads

20101222001016.000|20101222001018.000|TR0|this, Mr. Barbour if it insisted in racist 
20101222001018.000|20101222001021.000|TR0|remarks, he would be reincarnated as a

20101222001023.000|20101222001025.000|TR0|blacks."  Knowing Haley, that was an 
20101222001025.000|20101222001028.000|TR0|attempt at a joke, but you can't attempt 
20101222001028.000|20101222001030.000|TR0|jokes like that.
20101222001030.000|20101222001032.000|TR0|
20101222001032.000|20101222001035.000|TR0|ROLLINS:  Yes.  Yes.  Look, this is -- 
20101222001035.000|20101222001037.000|TR0|that is a, clearly, off- color comment 
20101222001037.000|20101222001040.000|TR0|from a different era.  And, again, this 
20101222001040.000|20101222001042.000|TR0|isn't about the south per se.  The south's

20101222005622.000|20101222005624.000|TR0|Commission today approved a controversial

20101222005700.000|20101222005702.000|TR0|don't understand it.  They hear this term
